I think that investing globally is good for index/ETFs investing and SGX is good for dividend investing. We dont really have much ETFs in Singapore and they are mostly low volume and higher ask bid spread as well. STI ETF have only 30 companies and it favors the banking industry alot because majority of the STI ETF is in DBS, UOB and OCBC.
